${ModID}:RuleCancel.NAME: Rule Cancel
${ModID}:RuleCancel.DESCRIPTION: Make a card in your hand ${ModID}:Occult. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:RuleCancel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Make a card in your hand ${ModID}:Occult.

${ModID}:Brainwave.NAME: Brainwave
${ModID}:Brainwave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Make a random Attack in your hand ${ModID}:Occult.

${ModID}:TelephonePole.NAME: Telephone Pole
${ModID}:TelephonePole.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Locking. NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Locked. NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:Gravity.NAME: Gravity
${ModID}:Gravity.DESCRIPTION: 虚无 。 NL 每当 you draw a ${ModID}:Locked or Unplayable card, 抽一张牌.
${ModID}:Gravity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 每当 you draw a ${ModID}:Locked or Unplayable card, 抽一张牌.

${ModID}:PhantomStep.NAME: Phantom Step
${ModID}:PhantomStep.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Make a card in your 抽牌堆 ${ModID}:Occult.

${ModID}:Repel.NAME: Repel
${ModID}:Repel.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Locking. NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Apply !M! Weak.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Locked. NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Apply !M! Weak.

${ModID}:OneIsEnough.NAME: One Is Enough
${ModID}:OneIsEnough.DESCRIPTION: {@@}抽 !M! 张牌{!M!|0=s.|1=.|2=s and choose one. NL You cannot play the other 本回合.|@=s and choose one. NL You cannot play the others 本回合.}

${ModID}:Curse.NAME: Curse
${ModID}:Curse.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Locking. NL Enemy loses !M! 点 力量 。
${ModID}:Curse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Locking. NL Retain. NL Enemy loses !M! 点 力量 。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Locked. NL Enemy loses !M! 点 力量 。
${ModID}:Locked. NL Retain. NL Enemy loses !M! 点 力量 。

${ModID}:MalleableFire.NAME: Malleable Fire
${ModID}:MalleableFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Add a *Molded *Fire that costs X to your 抽牌堆. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:MoldedFire.NAME: Molded Fire
${ModID}:MoldedFire.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Occult. NL Deal !D! damage for each [E] more this costs than your current energy.

${ModID}:DeepDream.NAME: Deep Dream
${ModID}:DeepDream.DESCRIPTION: 每当 you play a card 本回合, make a random card in your hand ${ModID}:Occult. NL 消耗 。
